name: AKS-74U
description: The successor to the well-known AK-47 rifle.  It combines the reliability of the AK series with the high-velocity, lightweight 5.45x39mm cartridge.  This version is a lightened carbine variant with a folding stock.

name: AK-74M
description: The successor to the well-known AK-47 rifle.  It combines the reliability of the AK series with the high-velocity, lightweight 5.45x39mm cartridge.  This version is a modernized variant with a glass polyamide folding stock and handguard.

name: AK-105
description: The successor to the well-known AK-47 rifle.  It combines the reliability of the AK series with the high-velocity, lightweight 5.45x39mm cartridge.  This version is a modernized lightened carbine variant with a glass polyamide folding stock and handguard.
